trans-unit.source: Azure Privileged Identity Management: Roles
trans-unit.target: Azure Privileged Identity Management: Roles

trans-unit.source: Learn what roles are used for privileged identities with the Azure Privileged Identity Management extension.
trans-unit.target: Learn what roles are used for privileged identities with the Azure Privileged Identity Management extension.

trans-unit.source: Azure Privileged Identity Management: Roles
trans-unit.target: Azure Privileged Identity Management: Roles

trans-unit.source: Roles from Azure Active Directory, Office 365, and other sources
trans-unit.target: Roles from Azure Active Directory, Office 365, and other sources

trans-unit.source: Azure PIM uses the following roles as default administrator roles.
trans-unit.target: Azure PIM uses the following roles as default administrator roles.

trans-unit.source: Global Administrator
trans-unit.target: Global Administrator

trans-unit.source: Billing Administrator
trans-unit.target: Billing Administrator

trans-unit.source: Service Administrator
trans-unit.target: Service Administrator

trans-unit.source: User Administrator
trans-unit.target: User Administrator

trans-unit.source: Password Administrator
trans-unit.target: Password Administrator

trans-unit.source: For more information about roles from Office 365, Exchange Online, Sharepoint Online and Skype for Business click here.[Assigning admin roles in Office 365](https://support.office.com/en-us/article/Assigning-admin-roles-in-Office-365-eac4d046-1afd-4f1a-85fc-8219c79e1504?ui=en-US&rs=en-US&ad=US)
trans-unit.target: For more information about roles from Office 365, Exchange Online, Sharepoint Online and Skype for Business click here.[Assigning admin roles in Office 365](https://support.office.com/en-us/article/Assigning-admin-roles-in-Office-365-eac4d046-1afd-4f1a-85fc-8219c79e1504?ui=en-US&rs=en-US&ad=US)

trans-unit.source: User Roles and Logging In
trans-unit.target: User Roles and Logging In

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE]In order for a user to be able to log in to Azure PIM, they must have a license for Azure.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE]In order for a user to be able to log in to Azure PIM, they must have a license for Azure.

trans-unit.source: Assigning a License to a User in Azure AD
trans-unit.target: Assigning a License to a User in Azure AD

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] The license option will only show up if licenses actually exit for this subscription.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] The license option will only show up if licenses actually exit for this subscription.

trans-unit.source: With a global administrator account or a co-administrator account, log in to [http://manage.windowsazure.com] (http://manage.windowsazure.com).
trans-unit.target: With a global administrator account or a co-administrator account, log in to [http://manage.windowsazure.com] (http://manage.windowsazure.com).

trans-unit.source: Click on **All Items** in the main menu.
trans-unit.target: Click on **All Items** in the main menu.

trans-unit.source: Select the directory you want to work with and that has licenses associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Select the directory you want to work with and that has licenses associated with it.

trans-unit.source: Click on **Licenses**.
trans-unit.target: Click on **Licenses**.

trans-unit.source: The list of available licenses will appear.
trans-unit.target: The list of available licenses will appear.

trans-unit.source: Click the license plan which contains the licenses that you want to distribute.
trans-unit.target: Click the license plan which contains the licenses that you want to distribute.

trans-unit.source: Click **Assign Users**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Assign Users**.

trans-unit.source: Select the user that you want to assign a license to.
trans-unit.target: Select the user that you want to assign a license to.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Assign** button.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Assign** button.

trans-unit.source: The user can now log in to Azure.
trans-unit.target: The user can now log in to Azure.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps
